page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: In our area there are three residential villages,Narborough, Enderby and Whetstone.There are not many shops in each village but they sell a wide variety of household goods. Each village is separated by countryside,covering a large part of our area.There are quite a few farms on this undulating land. Two small rivers,the Soar and Sence join North of Enderby bridge. There are quite a few things to do at the leisure centre in Enderby or in the village parks.There are several pubs in each village. A big mental hospital called Carlton Hayes lies between Narborough and Enderby.There is a main police station,well placed for access to the M1 motorway,one of the major roads in the country.{
